A simple tool that allows you to execute JavaScript code in multiple real browsers, powered by Node.js and Socket.io.

Why ?

  • Units tests / E2E tests
  • Running on Node.js
  • Running with Grunt tasks
  • Test on Real Devices
  • Remote Control
  • Testing Framework Agnostic
  • Easy Debugging
  • Continuous Integration

// Angular Example
var app = angular.module('Application', ['ngResource']);

app.factory('UserFactory', function($resource){
    return $resource('Users/users.json')
});

app.controller('MainCtrl', function($scope, UserFactory) {
    $scope.text = 'Hello World!';
    $scope.users = UserFactory.get();
});
